Package DAO

Class CashierDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.CashierDAO
  • public class CashierDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The `CashierDAO` class provides methods to interact with the cashiers table in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CashierDAO​(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Constructs a CashierDAO with the specified database connection.

      • AddCashier

        public int AddCashier​(java.lang.String firstName,
                      java.lang.String lastName,
                      int pin,
                      boolean isManager)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a new cashier to the database.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the cashier
        lastName - the last name of the cashier
        pin - the PIN of the cashier
        isManager - whether the cashier is a manager
        Returns:
        1 if the cashier was successfully added, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • UpdateCashier

        public int UpdateCashier​(int cashierId,
                         java.lang.String newFirstName,
                         java.lang.String newLastName,
                         int newPin,
                         boolean newIsManager)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates an existing cashier in the database.
        Parameters:
        cashierId - the ID of the cashier to be updated
        newFirstName - the new first name of the cashier
        newLastName - the new last name of the cashier
        newPin - the new PIN of the cashier
        newIsManager - whether the cashier is a manager
        Returns:
        1 if the cashier was successfully updated, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • DeleteCashier

        Parameters:
        cashierId - the ID of the cashier to be deleted
        Returns:
        1 if the cashier was successfully deleted, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
